p: The model of the regression equations of the particle size was significant with P valueâ€‰<0.05, P value of the lack of fit of the particle size was 0.1383, and the coefficient of R was fine. The predicted R 2 (0.8236) reasonably agreed with the adjusted R 2 (0.9420). The adequate precision was measured by the signal-to-noise ratio. A ratio greater than 4 was desirable. The ratio of 11.044 indicated an adequate signal. This model could be used to navigate the design space.
